2,Verify Successful Order Completion after Adding Items to Cart,"Navigate to the homepage and add items to the cart. Proceed to checkout, enter shipping details, and complete the order. Verify the completion page is displayed.","Step 1: Navigate to https://cellphone-staging.aut.katalon.com/
Step 2: Click on button
Step 3: Click on label
Step 4: Hover over link
Step 5: Click on span  -> Navigate to page 'cart'
Step 6: Click on button 'Proceed to checkout'
Step 7: Enter shipping details and complete order
